name: Absolutely Delicious Stuffed Calamari
author: UNREFINEDNERD
summary: Calamari tubes are stuffed with seafood and baked in a rich cream sauce before serving over a bed of linguine. This is probably the best calamari, if not the best entree, you'll ever have!
ingredients: ½ pound chopped cooked shrimp meat
12 ounces cream cheese, cut into cubes
¾ cup freshly grated Romano cheese
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Rinse the calamari tubes and pat dry
In a large bowl, stir together the onions, 6 cloves garlic, shrimp, crabmeat and lemon juice
Spoon some of this mixture into each squid tube and seal the ends by 'sewing' with a toothpick
Arrange in a single layer in the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish
Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Stir in cream cheese and 2 cloves garlic
Cook and stir until cream cheese has melted
Cook until heated through and then remove from the heat and stir in the Parmesan cheese and pepper
Pour over all of the calamari tubes in the baking dish
Sprinkle about 2 tablespoons of Romano cheese on top of each one
Bake uncovered until the cheese is browned and sauce is bubbly
While the calamari is baking, Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add linguine pasta, and cook until al dente, about 8 minutes
Serve the stuffed calamari and sauce over a bed of linguine
